characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Glys is the spren with which Renarin Kholin has bonded that affords him the Surgebinding abilities of a Truthwatcher. Their bond grants him the Surges of Progression and Illumination.
According to Jasnah, Glys is one of the Voidspren. However, Glys has actually been corrupted by Sja-anat.
Glys is better known as a mistspren.
